entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
